title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.7 - Temporary stay
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.7 - Temporary stay

State Regulations

The filing of an appeal shall not in and of itself stay
enforcement of any order of the chancellor. If an appellant desires a stay, he
shall file an application therefor, setting forth the reasons why a stay should
be granted. The appeal board shall have authority by filing an order to stay
temporarily, with or without an application therefor, pending a final
determination of the appeal (a) the enforcement of the order of the chancellor
from which the appeal is taken and/or (b) any action of the community board
which is inconsistent with such order. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
